product_name: The North Face Happy Camper Pack - Kids'
long_description: The North Face Happy Camper pack offers kids a scaled-down version of the adult-size Borealis, in a colorful and comfortable design that packs books and folders to class or outdoor gear on the trail. Youth-specific shoulder straps, sternum strap and foam back panel offer reliable comfort. Panel-loading main compartment contains a zippered mesh pocket. The North Face Happy Camper pack features an adjustable front bungee cord, side mesh pockets and a reflective light loop.
short_description: The North Face Happy Camper pack offers kids a scaled-down version of the adult-size Borealis, in a colorful and comfortable design that packs books and folders to class or outdoor gear on the trail.
